question: I lost several pounds in one day?
question_content:
So, I rarely ever eat breakfast, and when I do try to eat lunch or dinner, I can only have a few bites before feeling sick and don't want to eat. When I was weighed, I was at 109 pounds. That made me feel really fat. But then, the next day I went to the doctors for a check-up I weighed 104 pounds. My clothing wasn't heavy, I was wearing the same type of outfit I had the day before: a t-shirt and jeans. But I was wondering what could have caused me to drop 5 pounds in one day without doing any exercise or something. Any ideas of what caused it? Thanks.

Also, I'm 5'2, if that helps.
